name: Alpha Adhesives and Sealants Ltd A1020 Quick Grab Latex Adhesive
description: Alpha Adhesives and Sealants Ltd A1020 Quick Grab Latex Adhesive has been formulated as a multi-purpose adhesive for use where quick sealing properties are of advantage. It can be used to bond textiles, papers, packaging materials, etc., to themselves or to one another. It represents the ultimate in quick grab latex adhesives, and is ideal for bonding all fibrous materials to a wide variety of porous substrates. including carpet binding. A1020 is used for a number of operations in the carpet and general textile industries. It can also be used for carton sealing and for miscellaneous fabrications in the packaging trade.
